languages.text:
The familiar immediately restores 100% Wounds. The familiar is also resurrected if it has 0 Wounds. The next 3 Overseer abilities cost -1 AP.
Until the end of combat, the Obstructed enemy's attacks through the Eagle are considered auto-crit if hitting other enemies.
The familiar's maximum Wounds are reduced by 50%. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g} now also spends all available MP.

traits.locale_text:
The familiar immediately restores 100% Wounds. The familiar is also resurrected if it has 0 Wounds. The next 3 Overseer abilities cost -1 AP.
Until the end of combat, the Obstructed enemy's attacks through the Eagle are considered auto-crit if hitting other enemies.
The familiar's maximum Wounds are reduced by 50%. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g} now also spends all available MP.

languages.text:
The cyber-eagle immediately heals to full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} (even if it has 0 wounds). The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, attacks made by the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy in the direction of the cyber-eagle that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} that enemy's allies automatically score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}.
The cyber-eagle's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are reduced by −50%. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g} now spends all the Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Киберорел немедленно полностью восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} (даже при 0 здоровья), также с него снимаются эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживания{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывания{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушения{/g}. Три следующие {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g} требуют на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше.
До конца боя направленные в киберорла атаки противника, чей {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}обзор заблокирован{/g}, наносят {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический урон{/g}, если {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадают{/g} в союзников этого противника.
{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}Максимальное здоровье{/g} киберорла сокращается на 50%. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Перезапуск{/g} расходует все {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} надзирателя.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, attacks made by the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy in the direction of the cyber-eagle that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} that enemy's allies automatically score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}.

Киберорел немедленно полностью восстанавливает {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} (даже при 0 здоровья), также с него снимаются эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживания{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывания{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушения{/g}. Три следующие {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g} требуют на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше.
До конца боя направленные в киберорла атаки противника, чей {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}обзор заблокирован{/g}, наносят {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический урон{/g}, если {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадают{/g} в союзников этого противника.

languages.text:
Der Cyber-Adler regeneriert seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} vollständig (selbst wenn er 0 Wunden hat). Er wird von sämtlichen {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt-{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt-{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g}-Effekten befreit. Die nächsten drei {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} kosten -1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} weniger.
Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erzielen Angriffe des {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmten{/g} Gegners in die Richtung des Cyber-Adlers, die Verbündete dieses Gegners {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g}, automatisch {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Treffer{/g}.
Die {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Cyber-Adlers werden um -50 % reduziert. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reaktivieren{/g} verbraucht jetzt alle {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} des Aufsehers.

The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erzielen Angriffe des {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmten{/g} Gegners in die Richtung des Cyber-Adlers, die Verbündete dieses Gegners {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g}, automatisch {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Treffer{/g}.
Die {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Cyber-Adlers werden um -50 % reduziert. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reaktivieren{/g} verbraucht jetzt alle {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} des Aufsehers.

Der Cyber-Adler regeneriert seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} vollständig (selbst wenn er 0 Wunden hat). Die nächsten drei {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} kosten -1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} weniger.
Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erzielen Angriffe des {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmten{/g} Gegners in die Richtung des Cyber-Adlers, die Verbündete dieses Gegners {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g}, automatisch {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Treffer{/g}.
Die {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Cyber-Adlers werden um -50 % reduziert. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reaktivieren{/g} verbraucht jetzt alle {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} des Aufsehers.

languages.text:
Le cyber-aigle régénère immédiatement toute sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} (même s'il n'en a aucune). Tout effet d'{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} dont il souffre est dissipé. Le coût des trois prochaines {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} est réduit de −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Jusqu'à la fin du combat, quand les attaques de l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchent{/g} ses alliés situés derrière le cyber-aigle, elles infligent automatiquement des {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coups critiques{/g}.
Les {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximums{/g} du cyber-aigle sont réduites de −50 %. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Réactivation{/g} consomme désormais tous les {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} du surveillant.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle immediately heals to full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} (even if it has 0 wounds). The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, attacks made by the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy in the direction of the cyber-eagle that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} that enemy's allies automatically score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}.
The cyber-eagle's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are reduced by −50%. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g} now spends all the Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

Le cyber-aigle régénère immédiatement toute sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} (même s'il n'en a aucune). Tout effet d'{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} dont il souffre est dissipé. Le coût des trois prochaines {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} est réduit de −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

Les {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximums{/g} du cyber-aigle sont réduites de −50 %. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Réactivation{/g} consomme désormais tous les {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} du surveillant.

languages.text:
完全恢复生化猎鹰的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}（即便生命值为0也可以完全恢复），同时移除{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}效果。{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}接下来的3个{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点。
每当{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人朝生化猎鹰的方向攻击，失手{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}盟友时，此次攻击都必定造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。
生化猎鹰的{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}降低50%，{g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}重新激活{/g}能力会消耗监察官所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。

languages.text:
La ciberáguila recupera inmediatamente todas las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} (aunque esté a 0 heridas). Cualquier efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} que sufra queda eliminado. Las siguientes 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} cuestan −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Hasta el final del combate, los ataques de un enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} en dirección a la ciberáguila que {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactan{/g} en los aliados del enemigo infligen automáticamente un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}.
Las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} de la ciberáguila se reducen un −50 %. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivación{/g} ahora consume todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} del supervisor.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle immediately heals to full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} (even if it has 0 wounds). The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, attacks made by the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy in the direction of the cyber-eagle that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} that enemy's allies automatically score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}.
The cyber-eagle's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are reduced by −50%. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g} now spends all the Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

Hasta el final del combate, los ataques de un enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} en dirección a la ciberáguila que {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactan{/g} en los aliados del enemigo infligen automáticamente un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}.

La ciberáguila recupera inmediatamente todas las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} (aunque esté a 0 heridas). Las siguientes 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} cuestan −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Hasta el final del combate, los ataques de un enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} en dirección a la ciberáguila que {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactan{/g} en los aliados del enemigo infligen automáticamente un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}.

languages.text:
サイバーイーグルは即座に全快まで回復する（{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が0の場合も）。{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}効果は取り除かれる。{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}の次の3つの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}コストが-1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}される。
戦闘終了まで、{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}敵がサイバーイーグルに向かって行う{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}で、その敵の味方に命中したものは自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}となる。
サイバーイーグルの{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}が-50%低下する。{g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}再起動{/g}は監督官のすべての{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を消費する。

The {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} effects are removed from it. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s next three {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
Until the end of combat, attacks made by the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy in the direction of the cyber-eagle that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} that enemy's allies automatically score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}.
The cyber-eagle's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are reduced by −50%. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g} now spends all the Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

サイバーイーグルは即座に全快まで回復する（{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が0の場合も）。{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}効果は取り除かれる。{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}の次の3つの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}コストが-1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}される。

languages.text:
Siber kartal, anında iyileşerek tam {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlığına{/g} kavuşur (sağlık puanı 0 olsa bile). Üzerindeki tüm {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilme{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlik{/g} etkileri ortadan kalkar. {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}'in sonraki üç {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} 1 puan daha az {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcar.
{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}Engellenen{/g} düşmanın siber kartalın bulunduğu yöne doğru yaptığı saldırılar, o düşmanın dost birimlerini {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurursa{/g} bu vuruşlar otomatik olarak {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşa{/g} dönüşür. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
Siber kartalın {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanı %50 azalır. {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Yeniden Başlat{/g} artık Gözetmen'in tüm {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g}'sini harcar.
